p.k: "Paradise on earth." Luther's words reflect the admiration that many generations of music fanatics have felt for Josquin Desprez. More than 500 years later his oeuvre has lost none of its technical mastery, poetry, and power of expression. Weser-Renaissance from Bremen is glad to act as Josquin's champion with this full-blooded programme based around the Missa Ave maris stella plus a selection of Marian motets.
p.d: "Paradise on earth." Luther's words reflect the admiration that many generations of music fanatics have felt for Josquin Desprez. More than 500 years later his oeuvre has lost none of its technical mastery, poetry, and power of expression. Weser-Renaissance from Bremen is glad to act as Josquin's champion with this full-blooded programme based around the Missa Ave maris stella plus a selection of Marian motets.
